lessons.japanese: そんなことをする気には到底なれないね。
lessons.english: I cannot bring myself to do such a thing.

lessons.japanese: この仕事を１日で終わらせるなんて、私には到底無理な話なのよ。
lessons.english: It is just out of the question for me to finish the work in a day.

lessons.japanese: あなたの話は到底真実だと思えない。
lessons.english: I can't possibly think your story is true.

lessons.japanese: 私なんぞには野牛と鹿と馬とを描き分けることなど到底出来ない。
lessons.english: Me? I can't even begin to draw buffalo, deer and horses so you can tell them apart.

lessons.japanese: 彼の部屋は小奇麗とは到底言えない。
lessons.english: His room is anything but neat.

lessons.japanese: 彼に会う事などは到底思いもよらない。
lessons.english: I cannot think that I will ever meet him.

lessons.japanese: そんなことをする気には到底なれないね。
lessons.english: I cannot bring myself to do such a thing.

lessons.japanese: そんなことをする気には到底なれないね。
lessons.english: I can't bring myself to do such a thing.

lessons.japanese: あなたの話は到底真実だと思えない。
lessons.english: I can't possibly think your story is true.

lessons.english: I can't bring myself to do such a thing.

lessons.english: I cannot think that I will ever meet him.
